nodes.text: Nanth'ri was a planet found along the Nanth'ri Route. Celis Mott hailed from this world.
Nanth'ri was explored sometime between 20,000 BBY and 15,000 BBY.
During the Clone Wars, the planet was located within Separatist space.
Nanth'ri was a stronghold of the New Republic during the Hunt for Zsinj, which took place between 7 ABY and 8 ABY and the Thrawn campaign of 9 ABY.
The planet was occupied by the Yuuzhan Vong shortly after they arrived in Hutt Space.
By 25 ABY, Nanth'ri boasted a population of 500 million to 1 billion sentients.
